pullrequest.title: Fix deleting and saving light on server

content.raw:
It looks like #1182 is fixed, but my testing shows some issues still with #346 (also a regression test would be good; I can help with that).

Two things I noticed:

* I added multiple lights, but only one was written to the saved world sdf file.

* I rotated one of the spotlights, but that pose was not saved in the world sdf.

I can file these as separate issues, depending on how much you want to do in this pull request.
content.html:
It looks like #1182 is fixed, but my testing shows some issues still with #346 (also a regression test would be good; I can help with that).

Two things I noticed:

  • I added multiple lights, but only one was written to the saved world sdf file.

  • I rotated one of the spotlights, but that pose was not saved in the world sdf.

I can file these as separate issues, depending on how much you want to do in this pull request.
